# WebPage.CSSMediaType

**Structure**

A CSS media type as defined by the [https://www.w3.org/TR/mediaqueries-4/#media-types], or an arbitrary media type value.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CSSMediaType
```

## Overview

Media types are one of several media queries that influence the `@media` CSS at-rule; this rule is used by webpages to apply parts of a style sheet depending on the media properties specified.

You can customize the media type of a [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WebPage] by using the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WebPage/mediaType] property.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Create a media type with an arbitrary value.

## Instance Properties

- **rawValue**: The raw value of the media type.

## Type Properties

- **all**: Corresponds to the “all” media type.
- **print**: Corresponds to the “print” media type.
- **screen**: Corresponds to the “screen” media type.

## Inspecting page information

- **title**: The page title.
- **url**: The URL for the current webpage.
- **mediaType**: The media type for the contents of the webpage.
- **customUserAgent**: The custom user agent string.
- **serverTrust**: The trust management object you use to evaluate trust for the current webpage.
- **hasOnlySecureContent**: Indicates whether the webpage loaded all resources on the page through securely encrypted connections.
- **themeColor**: The theme color that the system gets from the first valid meta tag in the webpage.
- **isBlockedByScreenTime**: Indicates whether Screen Time blocking has occurred.
- **isInspectable**: Indicates whether you can inspect the page with Safari Web Inspector.
- **isWritingToolsActive**: Indicates whether Writing Tools is active for the page.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
